snippet: Bobby Cannavale will star in the Roundabout Theater revival of the Clifford Odets play about a Hollywood star with a dark secret.
abstract: Bobby Cannavale will star in the Roundabout Theater revival of the Clifford Odets play about a Hollywood star with a dark secret.

headline.main: Bobby Cannavale to Return to Broadway in Clifford Odets's 'Big Knife'
headline.print_headline: Cannavale, in Odets Play, Returns to Broadway
